# ClockStaRX

```{r}
library(devtools)
#install_github("duchene/ClockstaRX")
library(ClockstaRX)
```

```{r}
locus.trees = read.tree("data/newgts/all_singlecopy_orthologs_gene_trees.tre")
species.tree = read.tree("data/newgts/species_tree_newick.tre")
example.analysis = diagnose.clocks(loctrs = locus.trees, sptr = species.tree, pdf.file = "example.clockstarx")
```

# TreeShrink

Install:
```{bash}
cd bin
git clone https://github.com/uym2/TreeShrink.git
cd TreeShrink
python setup.py install --user
chmod 755 run_treeshrink.py
```

Run on gene trees & get output log:
```{bash}
bin/TreeShrink/run_treeshrink.py  -t data/newgts/all_singlecopy_orthologs_gene_trees.tre > output/treeshrink/treeshrinklog.txt -o output/treeshrink
```
